alert.note: Alert for Albany; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:03PM MDT until August 07 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALBANY AND SOUTHWESTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 103 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vedauwoo Campground, or 14 miles southeast of Laramie, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Laramie, Tie City Campground, Vedauwoo, University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium, Crystal Lake Reservoir, Crystal Lake Campground, Vedauwoo Campground, Buford, North Crow Campground, Granite Springs Reservoir, Granite Springs Campground, Horse Creek, The Buttes and Yellow Pine Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 314 and 340. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
